title: Is there a way to forcefully connect to the game?
body: After champion selection sometimes it doesn't connect me to the page that loads to the game and if I click the RIOT icon on the bottom right says the game is in progress and if I leave I will suffer penalties. There is no reconnect. Last game when I just waited, it finally went to the page and it was blank aside from the boxes and background, after a short time, a popup told me the game was no longer running and went to the page that comes after a game finishes. The game didn't actually finish though it just stopped. This was probably my fault but I could do nothing about it as the game doesn't allow me to forcefully go to the loading page. This doesn't happen too often but it could happen on my first game of the day, and again I need a way to connect to the game.

replies.body:
Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right corner of the patcher and hitting "Repair".

Let us know the results.

There are a lot of factors that could cause your inability to load. Rineyy has provided an awesome first step, but if you still have issues after the repair, it's likely you're seeing this issue due to a disconnection from the servers. In this case, I'd recommend you try the common solutions found in our [connection guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you have any questions.

If you're consistently having problems with the first game of the day, or the first game after you haven't been using your computer / League for a while, there might be some issues with your computer hard drive as well.  

How old is your computer?  Does your computer ever indicate problems with hard drive errors, or lost / missing files?  How often do you restart your computer (or do you leave it on all the time)?  How much free space does your hard drive have (especially the volume where League is installed, if you have more than one)?  Did you recently upgrade from Windows 7/8 to Windows 10?
